entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v4.3
entry.content:
Version 4.3 of HortusFox

Changelog - Faster switching admin tabs (#347) - Notes for locations (#348) - Fix upgrading to major versions (x.0) (#350) - Fix exporting backups to reflect changes of #211 (#350) - Improve layout of location action strips (#349)

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v4.4
entry.content:
Version 4.4 of HortusFox

This release is intended to implement the auto-upgrade functionality as described in #353

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v4.5
entry.content:
Version 4.5 of HortusFox

Changelog - Location notes backup (https://github.com/danielbrendel/hortusfox-web/issues/352) - Location log backup (https://github.com/danielbrendel/hortusfox-web/issues/351) - Let user choose what to update after identifying plant (https://github.com/danielbrendel/hortusfox-web/issues/368) - List all used tags for plants in search page (https://github.com/danielbrendel/hortusfox-web/issues/369) - Fix check for required input elements (https://github.com/danielbrendel/hortusfox-web/issues/360) - Recurring tasks feature (beta) (https://github.com/danielbrendel/hortusfox-web/issues/9) - Custom dates for bulk operations (https://github.com/danielbrendel/hortusfox-web/issues/355) - Quick plant identification widget (https://github.com/danielbrendel/hortusfox-web/issues/363) - Better colors for dropdown menus of history section (https://github.com/danielbrendel/hortusfox-web/issues/356) - Improve plant details for historical plants (https://github.com/danielbrendel/hortusfox-web/issues/357) - Various bugfixes and improvements

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v4.6
entry.content:
Version 4.6 of HortusFox

This is a hotfix release: It selfhosts FontAwesome free which is required in order to not fall into rate limiting. Selfhosting the icons is the approbriate way for a selfhosted application.

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v4.7
entry.content:
Version 4.7 of HortusFox

This hotfix update completes the recent migration from FontAwesome CDN to FontAwesome Free Selfhosted version.
